means: 允许( allow的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I was allowed to do whatever I wanted with my life.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以自由支配自己的生活。

sentence.Network_en: The Professor said that deep sleep allowed suppressed anxieties to surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 教授说深度睡眠可以使压抑的焦虑情绪得以释放。

sentence.Network_en: Directors weren't allowed any proprietary airs about the product they made.
sentence.Network_cn: 主管们不允许对他们生产的产品以所有者自居。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Chinese and Hong Kong companies have been allowed to issue renminbi bonds in Hong Kong ., 中国内地和香港企业已获准在港发行人民币债券.
the semi - finished expansion caused suites specifications allowed to variation ., 半成品伸缩变异造成版面规格不准.
your client is not allowed to accessed the requested object ., 您的客户端不被允许访问请求对象.
You are not allowed to refer to any reference books during the exam ., 考试时不许查阅任何参考书.

list.abs: 生活英语单词大全 - 豆丁网 ... 薪资福利 package 津贴 allowance 年金 pension.
免费-2013高考词汇表_百度文库 ... allow vt. 允许，准许 allowance n. 津贴，补助 almost ad. 几乎，差不多.
英文字典_百度文库 ... alligator 鳄鱼 allow 允许 allowance 津贴.
初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... all ad. 全部地 allow vt. 允许，准许 almost ad. 几乎，差不多.

entry.def: If someone is allowed to do something, it is all right for them to do it and they will not get into trouble.

example.ex: The children are not allowed to watch violent TV programmes...
example.tran: 儿童不准收看含暴力内容的电视节目。

example.ex: The Government will allow them to advertise on radio and television...
example.tran: 政府将准许他们在广播和电视上做广告。

entry.def: If you are allowed something, you are given permission to have it or are given it.

example.ex: Gifts like chocolates or flowers are allowed...
example.tran: 巧克力、鲜花等礼物在允许之列。

example.ex: He should be allowed the occasional treat.
example.tran: 应该准许他偶尔也轻松一下。

entry.def: If you allow something to happen, you do not prevent it.

example.ex: He won't allow himself to fail...
example.tran: 他不会任由自己失败的。

example.ex: If the soil is allowed to dry out the tree could die.
example.tran: 如果听任土壤变干，树木可能会枯死。

entry.def: If one thing allows another thing to happen, the first thing creates the opportunity for the second thing to happen.

example.ex: The compromise will allow him to continue his free market reforms.
example.tran: 妥协将使他得以继续他的自由市场改革。

example.ex: ...an attempt to allow the Moslem majority a greater share of power...
example.tran: 使穆斯林多数派拥有更大权力的尝试

entry.def: If you allow a particular length of time or a particular amount of something for a particular purpose, you include it in your planning.

example.ex: Allow about 75ml (3fl oz) per six servings.
example.tran: 每6份酌加约75毫升(3液盎司)。

entry.def: If you allow that something is true, you admit or agree that it is true.

example.ex: Warren also allows that capitalist development may, in its early stages, result in increased social inequality.
example.tran: 沃伦也承认资本主义发展初级阶段可能会导致社会不平等现象加剧。

entry.tran: 请允许我（用以礼貌地表示为某人提供服务）
entry.def: Some people say 'Allow me' as a polite way of offering to do something for someone.

example.ex: Allow me to buy you a drink at the bar.

entry.tran: 请允许我（用以引出要说的话）
entry.def: Some people use Allow me to... as a way of introducing something that they want to say or do.

example.ex: Allow me to introduce Dr Amberg.
example.tran: 请允许我介绍安伯格博士。

auth_sentence.content: In the Football League, loan deals are allowed.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the Football League, loan deals are allowed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the Football League, loan deals are allowed.

auth_sentence.content: They are allowed out of prison for homes visits.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are allowed out of prison for homes visits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are allowed out of prison for homes visits.

auth_sentence.content: Should Sam have been allowed to wear the t-shirt?
auth_sentence.res_content: Should Sam have been allowed to wear the t-shirt?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Should Sam have been allowed to wear the t-shirt?

Sentence.sentence: Lewis didn't see a "no parking" sign, but he has expected that his parking were allowed there.
Because boys generally have more acute vision learn best through touch, and are physically more active, they need to be given "hands-on" lessons where they are allowed to walk around.
Swedish women are allowed the freedom and opportunity to choose their own way of life.
In Saudi Arabia, women aren't allowed to drive.
Why does the man say extra time should be allowed for the project?
